name: Horse Blocks - Puzzle Games
description:
Love puzzle games? Love horses and other animals? Then this is the game for you!  The rules are simple - place the pieces on the board, once you fill a vertical or horizontal line it will disappear and free up space for more pieces. The game is over once you have no more space.

Easy to learn, fun, relaxing and suitable for all ages - kids to adults, boys and girls.

What are you waiting for? Give it a try!
